content: Surprised this not the top highlighted paragraph. Change is constant. It doesn’t matter what industry, what profession, what part of life you are living — CHANGE will happen — and it’s happening faster every day. There is only one thing you can do as a counter balance to change — and that’s LEARN. It’s not a meme, it’s not a platitude, it’s not a life’s mission — it is the only preventative measure you can take in an ever evolving world of change.
